creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for your dog to make friends? Looking to connect with other dog parents? How about finding an awesome dog park nearby, or seeing the dogs who are currently at that dog park?



Dog Buddy is the world's first app that lets you discover nearby dogs in your neighbourhood or city, see the dogs who are currently present at the dog parks near you, and allows you to chat with other dog parents.

With Dog Buddy, you can:

1. Find nearby dog friends for your dog.



🐶 Dogs need to socialize to live a happy dog life. This means they need friends to run with, play with and socialize with. With Dog Buddy you can view profiles of dogs near you, send friend requests to those who are compatible with your dog based on their profiles, and let the friendships begin.

2. Find nearby dog parks.



🌳 If you've ever asked yourself what is the best dog park near me, you've come to the right place. Dog Buddy automatically shows you all the dog parks near you. You can tap on the dog park name to get more information such as open hours, address, phone number, website etc. You can even single tap on the address of the dog park to get real-time GPS directions to that park. With Dog Buddy, it's easy to get your dog exercising at the dog parks.

3. See which dogs are currently at the dog parks.



👀 Some dogs are compatible with each other, while others are not. With Dog Buddy you decide who your best friend interacts with. Not only will you have the option to check in to the parks, but you can see the dogs who are already there. Tap on their picture to see their profiles, send friend requests to those who are compatible with your dog, and easily message their dog parents.

4. Chat with other dog parents.



💬 It's easy now to connect with other dog parents. Whether you want to set up play dates with other dogs, tell about events, or simply say hello! Dog Buddy has you covered with our real time chat that allows you to message nearby dog parents. Stay up to date on the pet world, and have fun with others who share your love for the dogs.

A healthy dog is a happy dog. Make your dog happy by getting him socializing with other nearby dogs and exercising at the parks.

Download Dog Buddy Today! And make your fur baby happy.

title: Dog Buddy - Nearby Dog Friends

creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
As dog parents, we all have encountered a situation where we have run into a dog at the park that our dog absolutely adored playing with. They played together and wag wag wag! their tails with big smiles on their faces, and then it was time for us to leave. As we left, we said, “Hopefully we'll run into you again, but we had no idea when that dog would be at the park again, and we had no way to reconnect.

Wouldn't it be nice to be able to see when that dog is at the park again? Or to be able to send a message to the dog parent to schedule a play date. Or discover new friends nearby for your dog to make. If so, you have discovered the perfect app.

With Dog Buddy, you can:

1. Discover and make friends with dogs in your area.



For dogs to be happy they need friends to run with, play with, and socialize with. With Dog Buddy, you can easily find friends for your dog in your area. Just browse the dogs near you, send friend requests to those who match your preference, and let the wag friendships begin.

2. See the dogs currently present at the nearby dog parks.



Some dogs are compatible with each other, while others are not. With Dog Buddy, not only will you have the option to check in to the park, but you can see the dogs who are already there. This way, you decide which dogs your best friend interacts with, and when is the best time to take your wag friend to the park.

3. Find amazing dog parks and dog beaches near you.



An active dog is a healthy dog, which is why we show you all the amazing dog parks and dog beaches near you. So get your dog exercising at their favourite dog park or beach today.

4. Chat with other dog parents.



You can set up play dates with other dogs, talk about dog events, or simply say hello! We make it easy for you to connect with other dog parents who share your love for dogs.

5. Find dog-friendly amenities near you.



Whether you are traveling or at home, you can easily find nearby dog-friendly restaurants, hotels, pet shops, groomers, salons, and much more. Dog Buddy give you access to all the amenities you need in one place so you don't have to waste time searching for them.

There are amazing apps out there such as rover -dog sitters & walkers but we are not associated with rover -dog sitters & walkers. If you use rover -dog sitters & walkers, you can make use of Dog Buddy to help you with dog sitting and walking experience.

With Dog Buddy, you will make your dog happy and healthy. Download today and change your dog's life for the better.

title: Wag Buddy - Happy Dogs

creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Our dogs give us unconditional love and true friendship. It's time for us to appreciate our fur babies, and make them happy with Wag Buddy.

1. Discover dog-friendly Parks, Beaches, and Hiking Trails.


An active dog is a healthy dog, which is why we show you all the amazing dog-friendly parks, beaches, and hiking trails near you. So get outside and start new adventures with your best friend today.

2. See the dogs currently at the nearby dog parks.


Some dogs are compatible with each other, while others are not. With Wag Buddy, not only will you have the option to check in to the park, but you can see the dogs who are already there. This way, you decide which dogs your best friend interacts with, and when is the best time to take your pup to the park.

3. Get Notified when your dog's friends arrive at the park.


Dogs are social, and have their favorite friends they like to play with. With Wag Buddy, you will receive real-time notifications when your dog's friends arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

4. Meet local dogs and make new friends.


For dogs to be happy they need friends to run with, play with, and socialize with. With Wag Buddy, you can easily find friends for your dog in your area. Just browse the dogs near you, send friend requests to those who match your preference, and let your dog's friendships begin.

5. Find dog-friendly places near you, or in your destination city.


Whether you are traveling or at home, Wag Buddy makes it easy for you to find dog-friendly places. Find restaurants, hotels, groomers, salons, walkers, doggy daycares, and much more. Wag Buddy gives you access to dog-friendly places near you, or in your destination city so you can easily find all you need.

6. Unique Social Experience.


You can join dog lovers around the world or in your nearby local community. You can even set up your very own private social page with your friends. Share pictures or videos of your dog's adventures, or see what other dog lovers or your friends are up to. Discuss local community events, help find lost dogs in your area, chat with other dog owners, set up playdates, watch dog-oriented movies, and much more.

7. Chat Privately with other dog parents.


You can set up play dates with other dogs, talk about local events, or simply say hello! We make it easy for you to privately connect with other dog parents who share your love for dogs.

8. List Your Dog Service for Free.


If you are a dog service provider, you can list your business in our app for free! Yes, you heard that correctly. It is completely free! Reach out to thousands of dog owners using our app and watch your business grow.

Wag Buddy is the must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Make your dog happy by downloading the app today!

1. Discover dog-friendly Parks, Beaches, and Hiking Trails.


An active dog is a healthy dog, which is why we show you all the amazing dog-friendly parks, beaches, and hiking trails near you. So get outside and start new adventures with your best friend today.

2. Find dog-friendly places near you, or in your destination city.


Whether you are traveling or at home, Wag Buddy makes it easy for you to find dog-friendly places. Find restaurants, hotels, groomers, salons, walkers, doggy daycares, and much more. Wag Buddy gives you access to dog-friendly places near you, or in your destination city so you can easily find all you need.

3. Meet local dogs and make new friends.


For dogs to be happy they need friends to run with, play with, and socialize with. With Wag Buddy, you can easily find friends for your dog in your area. Just browse the dogs near you, send friend requests to those who match your preference, and let your dog's friendships begin.

4. See the dogs currently at the nearby dog parks.


Some dogs are compatible with each other, while others are not. With Wag Buddy, not only will you have the option to check in to the park, but you can see the dogs who are already there. This way, you decide which dogs your best friend interacts with, and when is the best time to take your pup to the park.

5. Get Notified when your dog's friends arrive at the park.


Dogs are social, and have their favorite friends they like to play with. With Wag Buddy, you will receive real-time notifications when your dog's friends arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

6. Unique Social Experience.


You can join dog lovers around the world or in your nearby local community. You can even set up your very own private social page with your friends. Share pictures or videos of your dog's adventures, or see what other dog lovers or your friends are up to. Discuss local community events, help find lost dogs in your area, chat with other dog owners, set up playdates, watch dog-oriented movies, and much more.

7. Chat Privately with other dog parents.


You can set up play dates with other dogs, talk about local events, or simply say hello! We make it easy for you to privately connect with other dog parents who share your love for dogs.

8. List Your Dog Service for Free.


If you are a dog service provider, you can list your business in our app for free! Yes, you heard that correctly. It is completely free! Reach out to thousands of dog owners using our app and watch your business grow.

Wag Buddy is the must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Make your dog happy by downloading the app today!

title: Wag Buddy - Find Dog Parks

creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wag Buddy. The new Dog Social and Dog Friendly App!

It's like having a dog tripadvisor and Instagram. Watch dog videos and reels. Discover dog parks, trails, and beaches. Find dog friendly places and services such as hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and much more.

Why should you download Wag Buddy?

It's fun, convenient, and time-saving.

Our features include:

1. A unique social experience focusing on the pups.


See what the doggos are up to in the world, in your local community, or in the nearby dog parks. Follow your favourite dogs and dog parks, or just sit back and watch the adventures of the pups from all over the world.

2. Your very own private social page with your friends.


Want privacy? No problem. With Wag Buddy, you and your friends can have your very own private social page. Discuss dog events, start forums, and share pictures, videos, reels, and much more. Start your dogpack and enjoy everything we have to offer in complete privacy.

3. Make new friends for your dog.


For dogs to be happy, they need friends to play with and socialize with. Grow your dogpack by browsing the profiles of other pups nearby and sending friend requests to those who match your preferences. Chat privately with other dog parents, set up playdates, and let your dog's friendships begin.

4. Discover Dog Parks, Trails and Beaches.


With our interactive map, you can easily find dog parks, trails, and beaches near you. See the dogs currently checked in at those parks. This way, you decide which dogs your best friend interacts with and when the best time is to take your pup to the park.

5. Get Notified when your dog's friends arrive at the dog park.


Dogs are social and have their favourite friends they like to play with. With Wag Buddy, you will receive real-time notifications when your dog's friends or dog pack arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

6. Find Dog Friendly Places and Services near you or in your destination city.


Whether you are at home or traveling, you can easily find dog friendly hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and much more. So relax and bring fido with you everywhere you go.

7. Filters to help you find what you are looking for.


Whether you are looking for a fenced dog park, a hotel with no pet fee, a restaurant with a heated patio, or a doggy daycare that is open late on the weekends, Wag Buddy has you covered. Simply select your preferences in our filter, and the app will show you exactly what you are looking for. It's simple and easy, and it saves you time.

8. Add a Dog Friendly Place or Service.


As dog lovers, we all love to share the dog-friendly places we discover with our fellow dog parents. With Wag Buddy, you can easily add a new dog friendly place or service, so our pups can enjoy being part of our everyday lives.

Wag Buddy is a must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Download the app and start new adventures with your best friend today!
descriptionShort: Dog Social, Dog Parks & Dog Friendly Places. Meet Friends & Share Adventures!

creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Wag Buddy. The new Dog Social and Dog Friendly App!

It's like having a dog tripadvisor and Instagram. Watch dog videos and reels. Discover dog parks, trails, and beaches. Find dog friendly places and services such as hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and much more.

Why should you download Wag Buddy?

It's fun, convenient, and time-saving.

Our features include:

1. A unique social experience focusing on the pups.


See what the doggos are up to in the world, in your local community, or in the nearby dog parks. Follow your favourite dogs and dog parks, or just sit back and watch the adventures of the pups from all over the world.

2. Your very own private social page with your friends.


Want privacy? No problem. With Wag Buddy, you and your friends can have your very own private social page. Discuss dog events, start forums, and share pictures, videos, reels, and much more. Start your dogpack and enjoy everything we have to offer in complete privacy.

3. Make new friends for your dog.


For dogs to be happy, they need friends to play with and socialize with. Grow your dogpack by browsing the profiles of other pups nearby and sending friend requests to those who match your preferences. Chat privately with other dog parents, set up playdates, and let your dog's friendships begin.

4. Discover Dog Parks, Trails and Beaches.


With our interactive map, you can easily find dog parks, trails, and beaches near you. See the dogs currently checked in at those parks. This way, you decide which dogs your best friend interacts with and when the best time is to take your pup to the park.

5. Get Notified when your dog's friends arrive at the dog park.


Dogs are social and have their favourite friends they like to play with. With Wag Buddy, you will receive real-time notifications when your dog's friends or dog pack arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

6. Find Dog Friendly Places and Services near you or in your destination city.


Whether you are at home or traveling, you can easily find dog friendly hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and much more. So relax and bring fido with you everywhere you go.

7. Filters to help you find what you are looking for.


Whether you are looking for a fenced dog park, a hotel with no pet fee, a restaurant with a heated patio, or a doggy daycare that is open late on the weekends, Wag Buddy has you covered. Simply select your preferences in our filter, and the app will show you exactly what you are looking for. It's simple and easy, and it saves you time.

8. Add a Dog Friendly Place or Service.


As dog lovers, we all love to share the dog-friendly places we discover with our fellow dog parents. With Wag Buddy, you can easily add a new dog friendly place or service, so our pups can enjoy being part of our everyday lives.

Wag Buddy is a must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Download the app and start new adventures with your best friend today!
descriptionShort: Dog Social, Dog Parks & Dog Friendly Places. Meet Friends & Share Adventures!

title:

creator: Insta Connect Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Explore the amazing world of pups. Scroll through adorable dog moments. Find dog-friendly places and services, such as dog parks, trails, beaches, hotels, restaurants, daycares, walkers, groomers, and more. It's never been this easy to bring fido with you everywhere you go.

Why should you download Wag Buddy? It's fun, convenient, and time-saving.

Our features include:

📷 An ultimate pup-centric Social Feed!


Scroll through an endless stream of purr-fect doggo moments. Post and share your adventures with the world or privately with your friends. Explore doggy happenings in our three main social feed sections: worldwide, nearby, and dog parks. The dog park feed allows park-goers to share posts and updates with fellow dog owners who frequent the same park.

🌳 Find Dog Parks, Trails, and Beaches.


Use our interactive map to find dog parks, trails, and beaches. See all the features the park offers, directions, and the dogs checked in at the park. This way, you can decide which dogs your best friend interacts with and when to go to the park. You can even switch to the 'street view' to get a crystal-clear view of the park. Check the ratings and reviews for a heads-up on what to expect before you bring fido to the park.

🐶 Find Dog-Friendly Places and Services near you or in your destination city.


Whether you're at home or traveling, you can easily find dog friendly hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and more. Get the best deals on dog-friendly hotels. So, kick back, relax, and bring fido along wherever your adventures take you.

🏆 Earn Points and Win Weekly Prizes!


Use the app to earn points and unlock badges. The top 5 point earners each week qualify for fantastic prizes. If you didn't make the top 5, no worries; use your points to unlock cool in-app rewards and features. The more you use the app, the more prizes you win.

🎾 Find Playmates for your dog based on size, gender, or breed.


For dogs to be happy, they need friends to play with and socialize with. With Wag Buddy, you can browse profiles of nearby pups, send friend requests to those who match your preferences, chat privately with other dog parents, set up playdates, and let your dog's friendships begin.

🔔 Receive Notifications when your dog's friends arrive at the dog park.


Dogs love socializing, especially with their favorite playmates. With Wag Buddy, you'll stay informed through real-time notifications when your dog's friends (or dog pack) arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

🍀 Filters to help you find what you are looking for.


Whether you are looking for a fenced dog park, a hotel with no pet fee, a restaurant with a heated patio, or a doggy daycare that is open late on the weekends, Wag Buddy has you covered. Simply select your preferences in our filter, and the app will show you exactly what you are looking for. It's simple and easy, and it saves you time.

📆 Discover dog-friendly Events & Activities.


Find exciting events & activities to enjoy with your pup. You can even create your own events to share with friends or the entire community.

💔 Missing Dog Feature.


If rover goes missing, you can create a 'missing dog poster'. This is shown to all users in the area where rover was last seen. An in-app notification is also sent to everyone nearby, helping in bringing rover back home.

🐾 Add a Dog Friendly Place or Service.


As dog lovers, we love to share the dog-friendly places we discover with our fellow dog parents. With Wag Buddy, you can easily add a new dog friendly place or service, so our pups can enjoy being part of our everyday lives.

Wag Buddy is a must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Download the app and start new adventures with your best friend today!

Explore the amazing world of pups. Scroll through adorable dog moments. Find dog-friendly places and services, such as dog parks, trails, beaches, hotels, restaurants, daycares, walkers, groomers, and more. It's never been this easy to bring fido with you everywhere you go.

Why should you download Wag Buddy? It's fun, convenient, and time-saving.

Our features include:

📷 An ultimate pup-centric Social Feed!


Scroll through an endless stream of purr-fect doggo moments. Post and share your adventures with the world or privately with your friends. Explore doggy happenings in our three main social feed sections: worldwide, nearby, and dog parks. The dog park feed allows park-goers to share posts and updates with fellow dog owners who frequent the same park.

🌳 Find Dog Parks, Trails, and Beaches.


Use our interactive map to find dog parks, trails, and beaches. See all the features the park offers, directions, and the dogs checked in at the park. This way, you can decide which dogs your best friend interacts with and when to go to the park. You can even switch to the 'street view' to get a crystal-clear view of the park. Check the ratings and reviews for a heads-up on what to expect before you bring fido to the park.

🐶 Find Dog-Friendly Places and Services near you or in your destination city.


Whether you're at home or traveling, you can easily find dog friendly hotels, restaurants, coffee shops, doggy daycares, dog walkers, groomers, and more. Get the best deals on dog-friendly hotels. So, kick back, relax, and bring fido along wherever your adventures take you.

🏆 Earn Points and Win Weekly Prizes!


Use the app to earn points and unlock badges. The top 5 point earners each week qualify for fantastic prizes. If you didn't make the top 5, no worries; use your points to unlock cool in-app rewards and features. The more you use the app, the more prizes you win.

🎾 Find Playmates for your dog based on size, gender, or breed.


For dogs to be happy, they need friends to play with and socialize with. With Wag Buddy, you can browse profiles of nearby pups, send friend requests to those who match your preferences, chat privately with other dog parents, set up playdates, and let your dog's friendships begin.

🔔 Receive Notifications when your dog's friends arrive at the dog park.


Dogs love socializing, especially with their favorite playmates. With Wag Buddy, you'll stay informed through real-time notifications when your dog's friends (or dog pack) arrive at the park. This way, you will never miss out on an opportunity for your dog to play with his or her friends.

🍀 Filters to help you find what you are looking for.


Whether you are looking for a fenced dog park, a hotel with no pet fee, a restaurant with a heated patio, or a doggy daycare that is open late on the weekends, Wag Buddy has you covered. Simply select your preferences in our filter, and the app will show you exactly what you are looking for. It's simple and easy, and it saves you time.

📆 Discover dog-friendly Events & Activities.


Find exciting events & activities to enjoy with your pup. You can even create your own events to share with friends or the entire community.

💔 Missing Dog Feature.


If rover goes missing, you can create a 'missing dog poster'. This is shown to all users in the area where rover was last seen. An in-app notification is also sent to everyone nearby, helping in bringing rover back home.

🐾 Add a Dog Friendly Place or Service.


As dog lovers, we love to share the dog-friendly places we discover with our fellow dog parents. With Wag Buddy, you can easily add a new dog friendly place or service, so our pups can enjoy being part of our everyday lives.

Wag Buddy is a must-have app for all dog lovers. So why wait? Download the app and start new adventures with your best friend today!
